text: The 1937 Oregon Webfoots football team represented the University of Oregon in the Pacific Coast Conference (PCC) during the 1937 college football season. In their sixth and final season under head coach Prink Callison, the Webfoots compiled a 4–6 record (2–5 against PCC opponents), finished in sixth place in the PCC, and were outscored by their opponents, 158 to 114. The team played its home games at Hayward Field in Eugene, Oregon. ==References== Oregon Category:Oregon Ducks football seasons Oregon Ducks football
title: 1937 Oregon Webfoots football team
